Thanks

We'll be in touch shortly.

item.title: Coming soon
item.description:
Elite Sentry will launch soon.

Enter your email below and we will let you know when we launch beta access:

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description:
Terms of use

1. What This Service Does

Our service helps you monitor websites and APIs by checking if they're working properly and alerting you when there are problems.

2. Using Our Service

What You Can Do

  • Set up monitoring for websites and APIs you own or have permission to monitor
  • Receive alerts when we detect issues
  • Access our dashboard and reporting tools
  • Use our API to integrate with your systems

What You Can't Do

  • Monitor websites or APIs without proper authorization
  • Share your account credentials with others
  • Use our service to harm or overload other systems
  • Create multiple accounts to bypass system limits or quotas
  • Resell our service without our permission
  • Try to break or hack our system

3. Your Account

  • You're responsible for keeping your login details safe
  • You must provide accurate contact information

4. Pricing and Payment

  • We offer three service tiers: a free plan, a pay-what-you-want option, and enterprise solutions
  • All fees are in CAD and must be paid in advance when applicable
  • For pay-what-you-want, you choose the amount that matches the value you receive
  • Enterprise pricing is customized based on your organization's needs
  • We might change our pricing structure, but we'll tell you 30 days before

5. Your Data

  • You own your monitoring data
  • We'll keep your data safe and private
  • We'll only use your data to provide our service
  • You can export your data anytime
  • We'll delete your data if you close your account

6. Service Availability

  • We try our best to keep the service running 24/7
  • Sometimes we need to do maintenance
  • We're not responsible if our service is down briefly
  • We'll try to warn you about planned maintenance

7. Alerts and Notifications

  • We'll try to notify you quickly when we detect problems
  • We can't guarantee you'll get every alert instantly
  • You're responsible for setting up your alert preferences
  • We're not responsible if you miss an alert

8. Changes to These Terms

  • We might update these terms
  • We'll tell you about important changes
  • Continuing to use the service means you accept the new terms

9. Contact Us

If you have questions about these terms, please visit our contact page or email us at support@elitesentry.com.

item.title: Open-source licenses
item.description:
Elite Sentry is built on the shoulders of giants. We're grateful to the open-source community and proud to acknowledge the following open-source software and packages that make our service possible.

Core Technologies

  • Docker - Container platform (Apache-2.0 License)
  • Go (BSD 3-Clause License)
  • Hugo (Apache-2.0 License)
  • Kubernetes - Container orchestration (Apache-2.0 License)
  • Linux - Operating system (GPL-2.0 License)
  • Node.js (MIT License)
  • pgAdmin - PostgreSQL administration (PostgreSQL License)
  • PostgreSQL - Database (PostgreSQL License)
  • Python (PSF License)
  • React (MIT License)
  • Supabase - Backend platform (Apache-2.0 License)
  • TimescaleDB - Time-series database extension (Apache-2.0 License with TimescaleDB License Agreement)
  • Visual Studio Code - Code editor (MIT License)

Python Packages

  • aio-pika - AMQP library (Apache-2.0 License)
  • bcrypt - Password hashing (Apache-2.0 License)
  • codespell - Development tool (GPL-2.0 License)
  • FastAPI - Web framework (MIT License)
  • gunicorn - WSGI HTTP Server (MIT License)
  • isort - Import formatter (MIT License)
  • psycopg2-binary - PostgreSQL adapter (LGPL-3.0 License)
  • pydantic - Data validation (MIT License)
  • PyJWT - JWT implementation (MIT License)
  • pylint - Code analysis (GPL-2.0 License)
  • python-json-logger - JSON logging (BSD License)
  • sentry-sdk - Error tracking (BSD 2-Clause License)
  • supabase - Database client (MIT License)
  • uvicorn - ASGI server (BSD License)

Go Packages

  • goautoneg - Content negotiation (Apache-2.0 License)
  • prometheus/client_golang - Metrics (Apache-2.0 License)
  • streadway/amqp - RabbitMQ client (BSD 2-Clause License)

JavaScript/NPM Packages

  • Alpine.js - (MIT License)
  • autoprefixer - (MIT License)
  • concurrently - (MIT License)
  • postcss - (MIT License)
  • postcss-cli - (MIT License)
  • TailwindCSS - (MIT License)
  • @tailwindcss/typography - (MIT License)

List Completeness

While we strive to maintain a complete and accurate list of all open-source software used in Elite Sentry, the dynamic nature of software development means that some dependencies might be missing or outdated. We regularly update this list to ensure it reflects our current usage of open-source software.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

Updated 2024-08-28

TLDR: We collect only what's absolutely necessary to provide our monitoring service. Nothing more.

Our Privacy Principles

1. Minimal Data Collection

We only collect information that's essential for our service to function. If we don't absolutely need it, we don't collect it.

2. Transparent Collection

When we do need to collect information, we clearly explain what we're collecting and why.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
Values

Transparency

We prioritize transparency in our relationships with clients and partners, ensuring clarity in both our communications and billing practices.

Openness

Our comprehensive API lets you to access and manage your data seamlessly. We are dedicated to fully open-sourcing our product in the future.

item.title: Card
item.description:
Cards

Simple Card

Fast Transaction

Provides faster transaction, so money arrives in realtime 

<div class="relative max-w-xs border border-solid border-gray-200 rounded-2xl p-4 transition-all duration-500 col-span-12 xl:p-7 lg:col-span-3 md:col-span-6">
    <h4 class="text-base font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-primary-500 mb-2 capitalize transition-all duration-500 ">Fast Transaction</h4>
    <p class="text-sm font-normal text-gray-500 dark:text-white transition-all duration-500 leading-5 "> Provides faster transaction, so money arrives in realtime </p>
</div>

item.title: Form
item.description:
Forms

<form action="">
   <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 grid-cols-1 gap-x-8">
       <div class="relative mb-6">
           <label class="flex items-center mb-2 text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium"> First Name <svg width="7" height="7" class="ml-1" viewBox="0 0 7 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path d="M3.11222 6.04545L3.20668 3.94744L1.43679 5.08594L0.894886 4.14134L2.77415 3.18182L0.894886 2.2223L1.43679 1.2777L3.20668 2.41619L3.11222 0.318182H4.19105L4.09659 2.41619L5.86648 1.2777L6.40838 2.2223L4.52912 3.18182L6.40838 4.14134L5.86648 5.08594L4.09659 3.94744L4.19105 6.04545H3.11222Z" fill="#EF4444" />
               </svg>
           </label>
           <input type="text" id="default-search" class="block w-full h-11 px-5 py-2.5 leading-7 text-base font-normal shadow-xs text-gray-900 bg-transparent border border-gray-300 rounded-full placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none " placeholder="First Name" required="">
       </div>
       <div class="relative mb-6">
           <label class="flex items-center mb-2 text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium"> Last Name <svg width="7" height="7" class="ml-1" viewBox="0 0 7 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <path d="M3.11222 6.04545L3.20668 3.94744L1.43679 5.08594L0.894886 4.14134L2.77415 3.18182L0.894886 2.2223L1.43679 1.2777L3.20668 2.41619L3.11222 0.318182H4.19105L4.09659 2.41619L5.86648 1.2777L6.40838 2.2223L4.52912 3.18182L6.40838 4.14134L5.86648 5.08594L4.09659 3.94744L4.19105 6.04545H3.11222Z" fill="#EF4444" />
               </svg>
           </label>
           <input type="text" id="default-search" class="block w-full h-11 px-5 py-2.5 leading-7 text-base font-normal shadow-xs text-gray-900 bg-transparent border border-gray-300 rounded-full placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none " placeholder="Last Name" required="">
       </div>
     </div>
     <div class="relative mb-6">
       <label class="flex items-center mb-2 text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium"> Email <svg width="7" height="7" class="ml-1" viewBox="0 0 7 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <path d="M3.11222 6.04545L3.20668 3.94744L1.43679 5.08594L0.894886 4.14134L2.77415 3.18182L0.894886 2.2223L1.43679 1.2777L3.20668 2.41619L3.11222 0.318182H4.19105L4.09659 2.41619L5.86648 1.2777L6.40838 2.2223L4.52912 3.18182L6.40838 4.14134L5.86648 5.08594L4.09659 3.94744L4.19105 6.04545H3.11222Z" fill="#EF4444" />
           </svg>
       </label>
       <input type="text" id="default-search" class="block w-full h-11 px-5 py-2.5 leading-7 text-base font-normal shadow-xs text-gray-900 bg-transparent border border-gray-300 rounded-full placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none " placeholder="name@pagedone.com" required="">
     </div>
     <div class="relative mb-6">
     <label class="flex items-center mb-2 text-gray-600 text-sm font-medium"> Message <svg width="7" height="7" class="ml-1" viewBox="0 0 7 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
       <path d="M3.11222 6.04545L3.20668 3.94744L1.43679 5.08594L0.894886 4.14134L2.77415 3.18182L0.894886 2.2223L1.43679 1.2777L3.20668 2.41619L3.11222 0.318182H4.19105L4.09659 2.41619L5.86648 1.2777L6.40838 2.2223L4.52912 3.18182L6.40838 4.14134L5.86648 5.08594L4.09659 3.94744L4.19105 6.04545H3.11222Z" fill="#EF4444"></path>
     </svg>
     </label>
     <div class="flex">
     <div class="relative w-full">
       <textarea class="block w-full h-40 px-4 py-2.5 text-base leading-7 font-normal shadow-xs text-gray-900 bg-transparent border border-gray-300 rounded-2xl placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none resize-none" placeholder="Write a message..."></textarea>
     </div>
     </div>
     </div>
     <div class="flex items-center my-6">
     <input id="checkbox-policy" type="checkbox" value="" class="w-5 h-5 appearance-none border border-gray-300 rounded-md mr-2 hover:border-primary-500 hover:bg-primary-100 checked:bg-no-repeat checked:bg-center checked:border-primary-500 checked:bg-primary-100">
     <label for="checkbox-policy" class="text-sm font-normal text-gray-600">You agree to our friendly <a href="javascript:;" class="underline underline-offset-4">privacy policy.</a>
     </label>
     </div>
     <button class="w-52 h-12 bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-800 transition-all duration-700 rounded-full shadow-xs text-white text-base font-semibold leading-6">Send Message</button>
</form>
Forgot password?
OR

Login with social media

item.title: Progress
item.description:
Simple

# hello this isd
<div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-2.5 '>
      <div class='bg-primary-600 h-2.5 rounded-3xl' style='width: 50%'></div>
</div>

Showing value on left side

50% 
 <div class='relative flex items-center'>
      <div class='relative w-full h-2.5 overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-gray-100'>
        <div role='progressbar' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%' class='flex h-full items-center justify-center bg-primary-600 text-white rounded-3xl'></div>
      </div>
      <span class='ml-2 bg-white rounded-full text-gray-800 text-xs font-medium flex justify-center items-center '>50%</span>
</div>

Showing value inside of it

50%
<div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-3.5 '>
      <div class='bg-primary-600 h-3.5 rounded-3xl text-xs text-white text-center' role='progressbar' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'>50%</div>
</div>

Progress as tooltip

50% 
<div class='relative w-full pt-12'>
            <span class='absolute bottom-0 mb-4 -translate-x-1/2 w-12 h-10 bg-white shadow-[0px_12px_30px_0px_rgba(16,24,40,0.1)] rounded-full px-3.5 py-2 text-gray-800 text-xs font-medium flex justify-center items-center after:absolute after:bg-white after:flex after:bottom-[-5px] after:left-1/2 after:-z-10 after:h-3 after:w-3 after:-translate-x-1/2 after:rotate-45' style='left: 50%'>50%</span>
      <div class='relative flex w-full h-2.5 overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-gray-100'>
            <div role='progressbar' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%' class='flex h-full items-center justify-center bg-primary-600 text-white rounded-3xl'></div>
      </div>
</div>


<div class='flex w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-2.5 overflow-hidden'>
      <div role='progressbar' class='flex flex-col justify-center overflow-hidden bg-primary-600 h-2.5 ' aria-valuenow='20' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 20%'></div>
      <div role='progressbar' class='flex flex-col justify-center overflow-hidden bg-orange-600 h-2.5 ' aria-valuenow='30' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 30%'></div>
      <div role='progressbar' class='flex flex-col justify-center overflow-hidden bg-gray-900 h-2.5 ' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'></div>
      </div>





<div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-1.5 '>
      <div role='progressbar' class='bg-primary-600 h-1.5 rounded-3xl' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'></div>
      </div>
      <br>
      <div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-2.5 '>
      <div role='progressbar' class='bg-primary-600 h-2.5 rounded-3xl' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'></div>
      </div>
      <br>
      <div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-4 '>
      <div role='progressbar' class='bg-primary-600 h-4 rounded-3xl' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'></div>
      </div>
      <br>
      <div class='w-full bg-gray-100 rounded-3xl h-6 '>
      <div role='progressbar' class='bg-primary-600 h-6 rounded-3xl' aria-valuenow='50' aria-valuemin='0' aria-valuemax='100' style='width: 50%'></div>
      </div>

5 star
70%
4 star
9%
3 star
4%
2 star
2%
2 star
1% 
<div class="block">
      <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
      <span class="text-sm text-primary-600 font-medium">5 star</span>
      <div class="w-1/3 h-2 mx-4 bg-gray-200 rounded-full">
      <div class="h-2 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full" style="width: 70%"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-primary-600 ">70%</span>
      </div>
      <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
      <span class="text-sm text-primary-600 font-medium">4 star</span>
      <div class="w-1/3 h-2 mx-4 bg-gray-200 rounded-full">
      <div class="h-2 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full" style="width: 9%"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-primary-600 ">9%</span>
      </div>
      <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
      <span class="text-sm text-primary-600 font-medium">3 star</span>
      <div class="w-1/3 h-2 mx-4 bg-gray-200 rounded-full">
      <div class="h-2 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full" style="width: 4%"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-primary-600 ">4%</span>
      </div>
      <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
      <span class="text-sm text-primary-600 font-medium">2 star</span>
      <div class="w-1/3 h-2 mx-4 bg-gray-200 rounded-full">
      <div class="h-2 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full" style="width: 2%"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-primary-600 ">2%</span>
      </div>
      <div class="flex items-center mb-4">
      <span class="text-sm text-primary-600 font-medium">2 star</span>
      <div class="w-1/3 h-2 mx-4 bg-gray-200 rounded-full">
      <div class="h-2 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full" style="width: 1%"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="text-sm font-medium text-primary-600 ">1%</span>
      </div>
      </div>

item.title: Project documentation
item.description:
@tailwindcss/typography

View on GitHub!

Beautiful typographic defaults for HTML you don’t control.

The official Tailwind CSS Typography plugin provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML you dont control, like HTML rendered from Markdown, or pulled from a CMS.

Tailwind CSS IntelliSense extension for Visual Studio Code

<article class="prose lg:prose-xl">
  {{ markdown }}
</article>

To see what it looks like in action, check out our live demo on Tailwind Play.

item.title: Prose
item.description:
@tailwindcss/typography

View on GitHub!

Beautiful typographic defaults for HTML you don’t control.

The official Tailwind CSS Typography plugin provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML you dont control, like HTML rendered from Markdown, or pulled from a CMS.

Tailwind CSS IntelliSense extension for Visual Studio Code

<article class="prose lg:prose-xl">
  {{ markdown }}
</article>

To see what it looks like in action, check out our live demo on Tailwind Play.

item.title: Table
item.description:
Simple Table

Company User ID Type Industry Type
Louis Vuitton 20010510 Customer Accessories
Apple 20010511 Partner Electronics
Johnson 20010512 Customer Telecommunications
Starbucks 20010513 Reseller Retail 
<div class="flex flex-col">
      <div class=" overflow-x-auto">
          <div class="min-w-full inline-block align-middle">
              <div class="overflow-hidden border rounded-lg border-gray-300">
                  <table class=" min-w-full  rounded-xl">
                      <thead>
                          <tr class="bg-gray-50">
                              <th scope="col" class="p-5 text-left text-sm leading-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 capitalize"> Company </th>
                              <th scope="col" class="p-5 text-left text-sm leading-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 capitalize"> User ID </th>
                              <th scope="col" class="p-5 text-left text-sm leading-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 capitalize"> Type </th>
                              <th scope="col" class="p-5 text-left text-sm leading-6 font-semibold text-gray-900 capitalize"> Industry Type </th>
                          </tr>
                      </thead>
                      <tbody class="divide-y divide-gray-300 ">
                          <tr>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900 "> Louis Vuitton</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> 20010510 </td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Customer</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Accessories</td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900 "> Apple</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> 20010511 </td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Partner</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Electronics</td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900 "> Johnson</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> 20010512 </td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Customer</td>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900"> Telecommunications</td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                              <td class="p-5 whitespace-nowrap text-sm leading-6 font-medium text-gray-900 "> Starbucks</td>
